content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your HVAC service?
Thank you, Jim. Can you please provide your address so I can check our availability in your area?
Got it, thank you. Let me check if you're within our service area.
reason: Failed to verify service area, operator requested.

content: Hi Jim, this is Joe from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the delay—just confirming that 1529 Greenfield Ave. is within our service area. What time works best for your HVAC service? Also, do you need a price estimate before booking?
Would like a price estimate, yes, and mornings are generally better.
Thanks, Jim. For most HVAC issues, our diagnostic visit is $79, and we’ll provide a firm quote before any work starts. Does tomorrow morning between 9-11am work, or would another day be better?

Great, Jim. Your HVAC appointment is booked for tomorrow, 9-11am at 1529 Greenfield Ave. We’ll send a reminder today, and if anything changes, you can text back here. Thanks for choosing XYZ Home Services!
reason: Operator completed booking after agent failed service area check.
